title: Gravity DVDR R4 NTSC ANGELiC
description:
Dr. Ryan Stone ( Sandra Bullock ) is a brilliant engineer on his first space mission , with veteran astronaut Matt Kowalsky ( George Clooney ) . But , for a seemingly routine spacewalk , an accident occurs . The ship is destroyed , leaving Stone and Kowalsky completely alone , depending on each other in an environment of total darkness . The deafening silence confirms that they have lost any link to Earth ... and any chance for rescue. As fear becomes panic, the remaining oxygen is being consumed desperately . And probably the only way to get home is to face the daunting vastness of space .
